body:
Friendship is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of glamorous connections, styles, emojis on thousands of internet-connected devices.

You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want, without a single advert – all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover, stylish friends are added every week!
Pay on your smartphone, tablet, smart TV, laptop or streaming device, all for one low fixed monthly fee. Plans start from a modest £20.99 a month. No extra costs or contracts.

Watch anywhere, anytime, on an unlimited number of devices. Sign in with your ASLTE account to watch instantly on the web at actionsspeaklouderthaneomijis.com from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device that offers the Netflix ALTSE app, including smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, streaming media players and game consoles.

You can also download your favourite programmes with the iOS, Android, or Windows 10 app. Use downloads to watch while you're on the go and without an internet connection. Take ASTLE with you anywhere.

ASLTE is flexible. There are no annoying contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees – start or stop your account at any time.

header: What can I expect from ASLTE?
body: ALTSE has an extensive library of feature films, documentaries, TV programmes, anime, award-winning Deptford originals, and more. Watch as much as you want, any time you want.
